entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:48 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:32 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
